lead_paragraph: An article on Wednesday about pitcher Randy Johnson’s effort to win his 300th career game in Major League Baseball omitted the name of an active pitcher who has won at least 200 games but has yet to reach 300. In addition to Andy Pettitte, Pedro Martinez and John Smoltz, Jamie Moyer has also accomplished the feat. (Another active pitcher who was not named in the article, Tom Glavine, has won 305 games.).
